```{r}
#| echo: false

library(DBI)
con <- dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), ":memory:")
dbWriteTable(con, "mtcars", mtcars)
```

```{prql}
#| engine-opts:
#|   dialect: mssql
#|   signature_comment: false

from mtcars
filter cyl > 6
select [mpg]
take 3
```
